data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 89,782 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of South 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of South 24 Parganas to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in South 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of South 24 Parganas words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of South 24 Parganas.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 89,782 believers in South 24 Parganas and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in South 24 Parganas, West Bengal, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
